text: National Highway 227L, commonly referred to as NH 227L is a national highway in India. It is a secondary route of National Highway 27. NH-227L runs in the state of Bihar in India. == Route == NH227L connects Umagaon, Basopatti and Kalnahi in the state of Bihar. == Junctions == : Terminal near Umagaon. : Terminal near Kalnahi. == See also == * List of National Highways in India * List of National Highways in India by state == References == == External links == * NH 227L on OpenStreetMap Category:National highways in India Category:National Highways in Bihar
title: National Highway 227L (India)
